An eidolon learns to cast a minor spell as a spell-like ability. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{Burning Hands}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jcs7ba5depdyitey]{Comprehend Languages}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xoc3vhg3btmfjauq]{Cure Light Wounds}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.17eskras8cjynj10]{Detect Chaos}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tr7m97npkbgm4wp7]{Detect Evil}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkgysr5o92kxxn59]{Detect Good}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jo67xdocgdmk5hhh]{Detect Law}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.49yc9dpr4kvgki2s]{Magic Missile}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{Obscuring Mist}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kq916lznxo0ig68v]{Silent Image}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c11olzqztodz5o5x]{Vanish}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0onqjy8gfgop1xsi]{Ventriloquism}

This spell can be cast once per day as a spell-like ability.

At 7th level, this spell can be cast three times per day by spending 2 additional evolution points. The caster level for this evolution is equal to the eidolon's Hit Dice â€“ 2. The save DC for this spell is 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Charisma modifier. The eidolon must have a Charisma score of at least 11 and must possess the basic magic evolution to take this evolution.

The summoner must be at least 4th level before selecting this evolution. This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new spell from the above list.
